summary: March 22, 2067. At dawn of life, Milana remembers her life, when she was a young Chechen immigrant in Paris, struggling for a better life along with her school friends.
cast: Valeria Bruni Tedeschi|Linda Doudaeva|Jules Ritmanic|Louna Klanit|Louka Masset|Jérémie Yousaf|Dramane Sarambounou|Hippolyte Girardot|Romain Goupil|Malika Doudaeva|Sissi Duparc|Hélène Babu|Alice Butaud|Clémence Charpentier|Florence Muller|Vincent Deniard|Souzan Chirazi|Marion Brucker-Scali|Florence Ben Sadoun|Philippe Boulard|Rodolphe Brazy|Franci Camus|Philippe Chaine|Emma Charpentier|Jules Charpentier|Alain Cyroulnik|Marie-France Cyroulnik|Jean-Marie Frin|Valéry Gaillard|Patrick Gaudinot|Gaëlle Jeantet|Salman Kaissarov|Bernard Lefort|Fabien Lessard|Olivier Martin|Angeline Massoni|Franck Melse|Vladimir Najman|Hamza Ouali|Andrei Panibratchenko|Ali Sarambounou|Martine Schambacher|Frédérique Tarride|Anzor Tchoutchaev|Zezag Tchoutchaeva
title: Las manos en el aire
